extension.name: DailyHelpers
extension.author: TroY
extension.description:
Daily Helpers, automatic adjustments: - Maximize new main windows - Activate "Show Grid" - Activate "Snap To Grid" - Reset ambient color to black - Kill the initial directional light - Alter the camera for a better view
AutoBackup facility: - Whenever you save a scene, a copy of this newly saved scene is created
AutoSave facility: - Well, yes. An AutoSave-feature. :-)
Use "Edit", "Plugin Preferences" to change this settings!

history.log: doKillLight(): Don't test for a specific name. Test for the type of the object. This is OK since there's only one single directional light in the initical scene.
Changed default settings: No options are activated.
Bugfix release: Some changes were applied on loaded scenes (kill light, kill ambient)
Migrated from "TroyTools" to a newer code base.
